pages.text: To barter with a $(l:creatures/monster-piglin)$(thing)Piglin$(), either throw by dropping a $(item)Gold Ingot$() near an adult $(l:creatures/monster-piglin)$(thing)Piglin$() or using it on it. After the $(l:creatures/monster-piglin)$(thing)Piglin$() takes the ingot and examines it for 6 seconds, it tosses a random item to the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$(). $(br2)$(l:creatures/monster-piglin_brute)$(thing)Piglin Brutes$() ignore gold. $(br)$(l:creatures/monster-piglin)$(thing)Baby Piglins$() take the ingot without giving anything in return, instead holding the ingot.
